(Quite true.  In "The Ghost and the Machine" where Unicron attempted to be 
connected to Cybertron, he was foiled by the Autobots, who found out thanks 
to that retard Scourge.  Starscream, having his new body accidentally met up 
with Galvatron who then shot him.  It only showed Starscream spinning out of 
control though...so I don't know how he died)
